name: Ludwig Wittgenstein
notable_students: G. E. M. Anscombe, Rush Rhees, Casimir Lewy,   Reuben Goodstein,   Norman Malcolm
main_interests: Logic, metaphysics, philosophy of language, philosophy of mathematics, philosophy of mind, epistemology, aesthetics
influenced: Talal Asad, Bertrand Russell, Norman Malcolm, G. E. Moore, Frank P. Ramsey, Vienna Circle, Rudolf Carnap, Alan Turing, G. E. M. Anscombe, Stephen Toulmin, Crispin Wright, John McDowell, Robert Brandom, Donald Davidson (philosopher)
awards: - Military Merit with Swords on the Ribbon - Silver Medal for Valour, First Class - Band of the Military Service Medal with Swords
